title: Blank page & MIME type error on Cloudflare Pages
description: After deploying a React/Vite project to Cloudflare Pages, the site loaded but showed a blank page. The browser console reported a MIME type error where JSX files were served directly instead of compiled JavaScript.
solution: Ensured the project was built in GitHub Actions using `npm run build` and deployed only the generated `dist/` directory. Injected all required `VITE_*` environment variables during the CI build step via GitHub Variables.

title: Deploy workflow unable to download build artifacts
description: The deploy workflow triggered by `workflow_run` could not find the build artifact uploaded by the CI workflow, even though the artifact existed.
solution: Used `actions/download-artifact@v4` with the correct `run-id` from `github.event.workflow_run.id` and explicitly provided `github-token` to grant cross-workflow access permissions.

title: Cloudflare worker url domain config
description: The worker is running, but can not curl
solution: Go to worker and add Custom Domain. Don't add DNS or add Route. Custom Domain = DNS + TLS Certificate + Worker Binding
